thread.section_title: InnoMax Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InnoMax | innomax.com
thread.title: Walt Lund

author: Walt Lund
title: Walt Lund
text: We are long time and satisfied customers of Innomax (Denver) and recently replaced our old mattress with a similar version of the original only to discover it was defective after months of use. They graciously offered a replacement or better yet - full credit to an upgraded mattress. This also involved a difficult delivery to our house which is in a rural mountainous area of Colorado. New mattress, another delivery and we are sleeping in great comfort. Innomax couldn't have been more helpful and showed us how well they treat their customers. We highly recommend them.
